app.title: FCM Message Sender
app.description: Send personalized push notifications through Firebase Cloud Messaging. Manage multiple projects, configure advanced messages and reach your users instantly.
app.footer: FCM Message Sender - Developer tool to test and send Firebase notifications

certificates.title: Firebase Certificates Management
certificates.description: Add and manage your Firebase project certificates to send push notifications.

errors.alreadyExists: Certificate already exists for this project

message.title: FCM Message Configuration
message.description: Configure all the details of your Firebase Cloud Messaging message.

errors.certificateNotFound: Certificate not found for selected project
errors.sendError: An error occurred while sending the message

tooltips.deviceToken: Unique token that identifies the recipient device
tooltips.title: Notification title that will appear in the system
tooltips.body: Main text of the notification message
tooltips.image: URL of the image to show in the notification (optional)
tooltips.icon: URL of the icon to show in the notification (optional)
tooltips.clickAction: Action to perform when user clicks the notification
tooltips.badge: URL of the badge image for iOS
tooltips.androidSound: Audio file name for Android notification sound
tooltips.apnsBadge: Number to show on app badge
tooltips.apnsContentAvailable: Wake up the app in background
tooltips.webpushRequireInteraction: Notification stays visible until user interacts
